name: Avatar Photo Generation
description: Create unique avatars with advanced customization options, capturing diverse styles and personalities. Perfect for profile pictures, gaming, and more!

params.prompt:
Design a unique avatar that blends the user's favorite animal, {{workflow.parameters.favorite_animal}}, with a color palette based on their favorite color, {{workflow.parameters.favorite_color}}. The avatar should have a friendly, inviting expression, facing the camera, and display a dynamic full-body pose reflecting their personality. Outfit and accessories should represent the user's main spending category, {{workflow.parameters.past_spending_category}}, while featuring their favorite accessory, {{workflow.parameters.favorite_accessory}} for a personal touch.

The background should seamlessly integrate elements from both the favorite animal and the spending category, {{workflow.parameters.past_spending_category}}, creating a cohesive scene that reflects the avatar's personality. Depending on the spending category, design the environment—be it a chic modern space, nature-inspired, or futuristic—while harmonizing with the selected color palette.
